'''Stormstress''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Stretchy Anemo Fungus''' that appears in the [[Fungus Mechanicus]] event.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hide_notes = 1

|dendro_res  = 20%
|anemo_res   = 20%

|hp_ratio  = 1.8

|atk_ratio = 4.32
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Anemo Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Balmy Breeze
|desc_1      = Unleashes a Breeze Field at the location of the Lil' Fungus with the lowest [[HP]]. The Breeze Field will continuously heal all Lil' Fungi in its AoE by '''12.5%''' of their Max HP every 0.75 seconds for a total of 3 seconds. When healing, it will also briefly apply {{Anemo}} to the Fungi healed.
|file_1      = Stretchy Anemo Fungus Balmy Breeze

|name_2      = Rapid-Fire Cyclone
|desc_2      = Rapidly fires 3 times, each dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}. 

|name_3      = Tailwind Assault
|desc_3      = Increases the [[Elemental Mastery]] and [[Movement SPD]] of all Lil' Fungi on the team by '''50''' and '''15%''' respectively.
}}
